block.name: Correlator Kernew
block.import: from correlator_kernel import correlator_kernel # grc-generated hier_block
block.doc:
Performs IQ value correlation between recv and ref.
Algorithm: I = [recv[t].I * ref[t].I | t <- [0..int_period-1] ] Q = [recv[t].Q * ref[t].Q | t <- [0..int_period-1] ]
out.I = sum(I) out.Q = sum(Q)
